title: War and inflation
authors: Richard Davies, Josh Hellings, Finn McEvoy
subtitle: Will prices surge?
intro: What will the impact of the recent hostilities between Israel and Iran be for the global economy? As yet, markets have been pretty stable – but many are worried that oil prices could spike, sending inflation across the globe. Given these concerns, this week we look at …
